topic.title: History Of Present Illness - conformance rules

section.p: The History of Present Illness Section contains information about the sequence of events preceding the patient's current complaints.

ol.li: SHALL conform to IHE History Of Present Illness template (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.3.4)
SHALL conform to IHE History Of Present Illness template (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.3.4)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="10164-2" HISTORY OF PRESENT ILLNESS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
